title: After vaping-related illness, teen now has lungs like 'a 70-year-old's'
description: Late last month, the 18-year-old student athlete in Gurnee, Illinois, was hospitalized after using e-cigarettes for more than a year and a half. Now his lungs are similar to those of a 70-year-old adult, doctors told him.

title: A young swimmer was disqualified after a race for how her swimsuit fit her body. The outcry led to a reversal
description: A high school student's win at a swim meet was reinstated after she was initially disqualified because of the way her swimsuit fits her body.

title: Guantánamo Has Cost Billions; Whistleblower Alleges 'Gross' Waste
description: The U.S. military court and prison at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, have cost more than $6 billion to operate since opening nearly 18 years ago and still churn through more than $380 million a year despite housing only 40 prisoners today.

title: FDA To Banish Flavored E-Cigarettes To Combat Youth Vaping
description: President Trump announced Wednesday that the administration will move to force e-cigarette companies to take flavored vaping products off the market, as young people's use of them continues to rise and reports emerge of deaths and illnesses tied to vaping.
